item.description: The Setup I was working on a side project the other day and I needed to generate some spoken audio from generated text. This is called “Text to Speech” or “TTS”. There’s also “Speech to Text” or STT, and a few other acronyms to memorize for fun. I’m a huge fan of Home Assistant and last year they had several updates for their “Year of the Voice”. These updates gave the project functionality like those home smart speakers that were super popular for a while.
